title: In A Bid To Woo Voters, AIMIM Chief Asaduddin Owaisi Breaks Into A Dance At Aurangabad Rally
text:
In A Bid To Woo Voters, AIMIM Chief Asaduddin Owaisi Breaks Into A Dance At Aurangabad Rally

In A Bid To Woo Voters, AIMIM Chief Asaduddin Owaisi Breaks Into A Dance At Aurangabad Rally

Elections are here again and politicians are back to donning their 'colourful' avatars in a bid to woo voters, yet again.

This time Asaduddin Owaisi, the head of the All India Majlis-e-Ittehadul Muslimeen (AIMIM) and MP from Hyderabad, showed off some serious dancing skills at a rally in Aurangabad.

And he really does know how to shake a leg, take a look:

Maharashtra: AIMIM Chief Asaduddin Owaisi performs a dance step after the end of his rally at Paithan Gate in Aurangabad. (17.10.2019) pic.twitter.com/AldOABp2yd — ANI (@ANI) October 18, 2019

After addressing an election rally in Aurangabad, Maharashtra on Thursday, Owaisi suddenly broke into a dance while furiously waving his garland in the air.

Don't Miss 19.3 K SHARES 4.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES 3 K SHARES 2.1 K SHARES

When Owaisi was getting off the stage at the Pathan Gate, he saw people dancing to a song called "Miya Bhai Hyderabadi" that was released in the year 2018 by rapper Ruhaam Arshad.

He couldn't help but join in on the fun.

In the past, Owaisi strongly criticised Trump for calling PM Modi Father of Nation. He said that the American President has no knowledge about the history of India.

More recently, Owaisi faced flak for claiming that he donated 15 bottles of blood in a single day.

Speaking at a public rally in Maharashtra, Owaisi recounted how he donated blood when he heard someone required it in Osmania General Hospital. “A doctor asked if anyone has O positive blood. I said I do. So the doctor said ‘please help MLA saab’. That day, Allah is witness to the fact that I donated not one bottle of blood but 15 bottles.”

Soon after the 44-second clip became viral on social media, many pointed out that it was not possible for Owaisi to have had donated that amount of blood.
description: Elections are here again and politicians are back to donning their 'colourful' avatars in a bid to woo voters, yet again. This time Asaduddin Owaisi, the head of the All India Majlis-e-Ittehadul Muslimeen (AIMIM) and MP from Hyderabad, displayed some serious Bollywood dancing skills at a rally in Aurangabad. And he really does know how to shake a leg, take a look
